content: dishcloths are great small knits for holiday gift-giving they are quick to knit and when paired with a lovely scented soap and ribbon are perfect gifts for friends and family each dishcloth is worked in knit-and-purl stitch patterns that create a reversible textured design on both sides of the dishcloth edges are worked in garter stitch and a slipped stitch is worked at each side for a nicely finished edge
